message:
Aj shondha 7tar dike dariyesilam city college er thik ulta pashe over bridge er sherer kasei. ami r amar 1ta friend. kotha bolar 1ta porjaye chokhe porlo 3ta sele dariye sigaret khasse r samne diye joto meyerai jasse tader dike dhoaa disse r boltese Apu apnar phon no ta pls... Onekkhon dekhlam keu sara deyni abar keu protibad o koreni. pore ami 1jonke ask korlam vaia ami ektu kotha bolte pari? seleta raji holo. ami take bollam eije apni meyeder uttokto koren voy lagena? uni amake bollo amra vai satroleague kori. voy kisher? kothay kothay poristhiti kharap hoye gelo. ora ekhon amake marbei. pore ami dhaka college er amar 1 frnd er nam bolay jhamela hoyni. ei awamee bokhate der hat theke kobe mukty pabe ei deshta??? proshno prottekta bibekban manusher kase.
-Rumi
